!http://i.imgur.com/1nyjlm8.png!

!http://www.pikotietlesrobots.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/06/BruceAngry.gif!

What the _hell_ happened to my YT history? I certainly didn't delete it: I had five songs in there I was waiting to add to my Ipod, plus a lot of videos I was planning to rewatch! Are you fucking with me right now?

!http://img22.imageshack.us/img22/6351/icmq.png!

I was subscribed to, like, twenty channels! What on earth is happening right now?
topics.author: 5041b54f7f123b77af00a442

topics.body:
*playing minecraft after my old save got corrupted cause of fucking galacticraft(Don't play galacticraft; there's a known java bug that will corrupt your save file so if you don't save often there goes the world)
So openblocks added in generators that produce redstone power. . . about fucking time someone did this, before openblocks producing redstone was a huge ass pain that if your computer isn't top of the line would lag to death your entire computer.

I think people that make mods are starting to realize that people are playing minecraft and that minecraft is supposed to be a fun time killer that you look at the clock and go "holy shit I spent eleven hours on this?!" not "holy shit my computer is having a nuclear meltdown".
